dcanMsgParams Struct Reference
IP » DCAN

Structure holding transfer parameters of DCAN module. More...

#include <dcan.h>

Data Fields

uint32_t dataLength

Detailed Description

Structure holding transfer parameters of DCAN module.

Field Documentation

uint32_t dcanMsgParams::dataLength

Message object data length - Valid values: 1 to 8

uint8_t dcanMsgParams::msgData[DCAN_MAX_MSG_LENGTH]

Data Value to be transmitted

uint32_t dcanMsgParams::msgLostFlag

At the reception of a Message, Message is received or lost Valid only for RX - Valid values: TRUE or FALSE

uint32_t dcanMsgParams::rxFrameType

Received Frame is Data Frame / Remote Frame. Valid only for Rx For valid values refer enum # dcanFrameType_t

uint32_t dcanMsgParams::rxIdType

Extended IDE Type : Standard / Extended Identifier. Valid only for Rx For valid values refer enum # dcanXidType_t

uint32_t dcanMsgParams::rxMsgIdentifier

Message Identifier - [28:0] are valid bits. Valid only for Rx [28:18]: Standard Identifier , [17:0]: Extended Identifier
